description.p: This strange-looking, red, triangular briefcase is inscribed with various eldritch symbols. As an action, you can open the bag and pull out an object from the bag and throw it up to 20 feet. When the object lands, it transforms into a creature determined at random by rolling a d8 on the table below. The creature vanishes after 1 hour or when it is reduced to 0 hit points.

Flip a coin to decide if the creature is hostile or friendly to you and your companions. Whether friendly or not, it acts on its own initiative and in a fashion appropriate to its nature. Once an object has been pulled from the bag, the bag canâ€™t be used again until the next dawn.

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a creature of good alignment
